text: @EricTrump @realDonaldTrump 2/2, (4) Your Father is MURDERING Thousands of Americans. (5) He is STILL REFUSING COVID19 TEST KITS FROM WHO. & (6) REFUSING 2 give the ORDERS under the Emergency Production of Equipment. He is doing "NOTHING" but giving "MISINFORMATION" & Just plain old "TELLING LIES" AS USUAL
